price: 115. Kelmadda Rabbigaana waxay ku taam noqotay run iyo caddaalad. Ma jiro wax beddeli karaa Kelmedihiisa. Waana Maqlaha (wax kasta),wax kasta ogsoon.
arabic: وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِدۡقٗا وَعَدۡلٗاۚ لَّا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: watammat kalimatu rabbika ṣid'qan waʿadlan lā mubaddila likalimātihi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
